citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have a contingency plan in place. Not having a contingency plan in place doesn't ensure the
licensee will be prepared should an emergency happen. The licensee must develop and document a contingency plan.
Correct by 2/18/24.
This inspection was conducted with the Facility Representative. The exit interview was conducted with the licensee. End
of report.

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The licensee does not have a contingency plan in place. Not having a contingency plan in place doesn't ensure the 
licensee will be prepared should an emergency happen. The licensee must develop and document a contingency plan. 
Correct by 2/18/24. 
 
This inspection was conducted with the Facility Representative. The exit interview was conducted with the licensee. End 
of report. 
 
 n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
